name: Imagine That
description:
"JIMMY! GET BACK HERE!" 

Absolutely not, Ms Jenny - I’d rather risk death by bubble toad than recite my ABC’s again! Who doesn’t know how that goes, anyway? A 6-year-old, that’s who! And I’m 7!

Imagine That! is a Run ‘n’ Gun shooter set in a daycare centre where you play as Jimmy, a young boy with a hyperactive mind and a penchant for mischief. Step into a world of make-believe as our protagonist brings along his awesome weapon of annihilation, his trusty water gun! Exactly what he needs on his epic quest for freedom! 

Watch out - during this crossover between reality and imagination, all of the toys have come to life and they all share the same devious goal: to stop Jimmy from escaping! Will you guide Jimmy to liberation or fall back into the dreaded mundanity of daycare? The pressure is on! Time to pump it up!
